[Y]Procedures
[W]Break work into reusable blocks.
[c][m.]
[W]Modular code lets you test features
[W]independently and reuse logic safely.
[W]Name routines after actions so call
[W]sites read naturally.
[c][m.]
[G]- One routine, one purpose.
[G]- Keep inputs explicit.
[G]- Return cleanly.
[m][m-]
[Y]STRUCTURE
[C]Small routines make big projects
[C]manageable.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
